    Reference

    All functions

    BEN

    Demographic data from Benin

    CMR

    Demographic data from Cameroon

    GHA

    Demographic data from Ghana

    HTI

    Demographic data from Haiti

    MOZ

    Demographic data from Mozambique

    TZA

    Demographic data from Tanzania

    UGA

    Demographic data from Uganda

    ageGroupsGen()

    Generate list for 'demography/ageGroup'

    changeHSCFRGen()

    Generate list for 'changeHS/CFR'

    changeHSpSeqInGen()

    Generate list for 'changeHS/SpSeq'

    cleanLogs() clean_logs()

    Clean log directories

    clearCache() clear_cache()

    Remove all objects from cache.

    createBaseXml() create_base_xml()

    Create a base XML file and folder structure

    defineChangeHS() define_changeHS()

    Write the case management deployments

    defineDemography() define_demography()

    Define and write demography input to baseList

    defineEntomology() define_entomology()

    Defines entomology setting

    defineHealthSystem() define_health_system()

    Writes the health system part

    defineIRS() define_IRS()

    Adds the IRS intervention parameterisation

    defineITN() define_ITN()

    Writes the ITN intervention parameterisation xml chunk

    defineImportedInfections() define_importedInfections()

    Writes importation intervention

    defineLarv() define_larv()

    Function that writes the larviciding component

    defineNothing() define_nothing()

    Writes an intervention parameterisation xml chunk that does nothing

    defineTreatSimple() define_treatSimple() define_treatSimple_compat()

    SMC, MDA parameterization section

    defineVaccine() define_vaccine()

    Adds vaccine intervention parameterisation to baseList

    defineVectorControl() define_vector_control()

    Adds vector control intervention parameterisation to baseList

    define_IRS_compat()

    Adds the IRS intervention parameterisation. Compatibility version.

    define_ITN_compat()

    Writes the ITN intervention parameterisation xml chunk. Compatibility version.

    define_changeHS_compat()

    Function to write the case management deployments

    define_importedInfections_compat()

    Writes importation intervention

    define_larv_compat()

    Function that writes the larviciding component xml chunk

    define_nothing_compat()

    Writes an intervention parameterisation xml chunk that does nothing. Compatibility version.

    deleteLogs() delete_logs()

    Remove all files from the log directory

    deployIT() deploy_IT()

    Writes the deployment of an intervention.

    deploy_it_compat()

    Writes the deployment of an intervention. Compatibility version.

    .calculateSmoothCompact()

    Calculate smooth compact decay parameters

    .calculateSmoothCompactHalflife()

    Calculate smooth compact halflife

    .deployTime_compat()

    Basic function used for deploying interventions

    .placeholderCollect()

    Collect if current value is a placeholder

    .xmlTimeBlockSeq()

    Generate date sequence based on specified days, months and years

    extractList()

    Extract sublist which matches input

    generateScenarios() generate_scenarios()

    Generate scenarios from a base xml file

    getCache() get_cache()

    Get cached object from cache.

    listCache() list_cache()

    List objects and values in cache.

    loadExperiment() load_experiment() loadCache() load_cache()

    Load cached data from experiment

    make_ento_compat()

    Write entomology

    monitoringCohortsGen()

    Generate list for 'monitoring/Cohorts'

    monitoringContinuousGen()

    Generate list for 'monitoring/continuous/options'

    monitoringSurveyOptionsGen()

    Generate list for 'monitoring/continuous/options'

    monitoringSurveyTimesGen()

    Generate list for 'monitoring/surveys/surveyTime'

    omOutputDict()

    Open Malaria output dictionary

    processFile()

    Read file line by line

    putCache() put_cache()

    Store object in cache.

    readResults()

    Collect Open Malaria results into a database

    readScenarios() read_scenarios()

    Return cached scenarios

    runSimulations() run_simulations()

    Run openMalaria scenarios

    setupDirs() setup_dirs()

    Create folder structure

    setupOM() setup_om()

    Download required Open Malaria files

    setupScenarios() setup_scenarios()

    Generate scenarios from a base xml file

    splitSeq()

    Divide a sequence x into chunks of size n. Any rest is appended.

    storeScenarios() store_scenarios()

    Store scenarios in cache folder

    surveyAgeGroupsGen()

    Generate list for 'monitoring/ageGroup'

    syncCache() sync_cache()

    Synchronized cached data from experiment

    toggleDebug()

    Toggle debug messages

    toggleVerbose()

    Toggle verbose messages

    validateXML() validate_xml()

    Validate the XML file

    writeCache() write_cache()

    Write cached data from experiment

    write_demography_compat()

    Write xml chunk for demography

    write_end_compat()

    Write the underlying transmission dynamics

    write_healthsys_compat()

    Writes the health system part of the xml file

    write_monitoring_compat()

    Writes the monitoring measures xml chunk

    xmlTimeGen()

    Generate date sequence based on start and end date
